channel.title: Adobe kicked my ass
channel.description:
I figure since there aren't many active topics I'd bring my problem here in hopes of getting some activity.
My PhotoShop will not run correctly. I had a patch for it. And before I quit using it for a period it worked fine. Now it gets to the point of checking for a CD key (What the Fak? Iknwrly.). And then I cannot continue using it. I either need a CD key, or a new patch. I may just reinstall it all together. If someone doesn't know any way to help me.
Is it possible Adobe has patched the patches? Anyone have any info on it?

item.title: Adobe kicked my ass
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Eh, not really suppose to talk about warez (Or have the rules changed or something?) So, locked.

But check your messages.

Read full topic

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I don’t really care what has hapened to it. I was just hoping someone might have an explanation. Or a similar problem. I’ll probably just reinstall a new copy of it when I get home.

Read full topic
